Sentencas: This paper presents numerical and experimental investigations of syngas production from butane.
Titulo: A detailed surface reaction model for syngas production from butane over Rhodium catalyst

Sentencas: A surface reaction mechanism is used to model the reaction pathways.
Titulo: A detailed surface reaction model for syngas production from butane over Rhodium catalyst

Sentencas: The butane reforming simulations and experiments are conducted in two reformers (tubular and radial).
Titulo: A detailed surface reaction model for syngas production from butane over Rhodium catalyst

Sentencas: Starting from the reaction mechanism for methane conversion over a Rh catalyst, a reaction mechanism for butane conversion over the same catalyst is developed.
Titulo: A detailed surface reaction model for syngas production from butane over Rhodium catalyst

Sentencas: The surface reaction equations are coupled with the flow equations.
Titulo: A detailed surface reaction model for syngas production from butane over Rhodium catalyst

Sentencas: Porous resistance, catalyst concentration and reaction rate constants of the introduced reaction pathways are estimated by comparing the results of the model with the experimental data.
Titulo: A detailed surface reaction model for syngas production from butane over Rhodium catalyst

Sentencas: The model is able to capture the main features of the species profiles along the reactors as well as the selectivity trends for different equivalence ratios.
Titulo: A detailed surface reaction model for syngas production from butane over Rhodium catalyst

Sentencas: Moreover, the model predicts the fractional coverage of the surface species and therefore provides an insight into the reaction mechanisms on the catalyst surface.
Titulo: A detailed surface reaction model for syngas production from butane over Rhodium catalyst
